title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 6171.5 - Payment
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 6171.5 - Payment

State Regulations

Payment of funds pursuant to this Part shall be made
pursuant to contract entered into between the Division of Criminal Justice

Services and the award recipient service provider agency. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
6171.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
